items.sentence: Tom isn\'t likely to be sensible about that.
Do you think that Tom is still in Australia?
I\'m looking for somebody who speaks French.
I\'m much better at reading French than Tom.
I leave for Boston at 2:30 tomorrow morning.
We\'d all be very grateful if that happened.
Tom knows all about Mary\'s health problems.
Would you mind helping me write this report?
Would you mind if I ate a piece of this pie?
Do you have any idea how lucky you\'ve been?
I could have handled it without Tom\'s help.
I almost forgot to take an umbrella with me.
I always felt like Tom was hiding something.
There\'s no cellphone coverage in this area.
Please let me know when you\'re ready to go.
Would you know if Tom is allowed to do that?
We won\'t quit searching until Tom is found.
Tom made enough sandwiches to feed everyone.
Would you like to know why Tom didn\'t stay?
I asked Tom if he had experience doing that.
